verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee higher \w than|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* thee: \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w so|strong="H0935"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* precepts,

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, \w the|strong="H1288"\w* droves \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy herds, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* folds \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.
\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1288"\w* thy barns \w and|strong="H2935"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thy stores.
\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* fall \w down|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w storehouses|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* works \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w receive|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* thee \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w himself|strong="H8104"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thee: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* invocated \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w abound|strong="H3498"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* all goods, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* excellent \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* due \w season|strong="H6256"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w lend|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w borrow|strong="H3867"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w always|strong="H3117"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w beneath|strong="H4295"\w*: \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou wilt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w worship|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* ceremonies, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H0428"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w curses|strong="H7045"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* thee.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H0779"\w* \w in|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H7704"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w in|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H7704"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.
\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w shall|strong="H0779"\w* \w be|strong="H0779"\w* thy barn, \w and|strong="H2935"\w* \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* thy stores.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w shall|strong="H0779"\w* \w be|strong="H0779"\w* \w the|strong="H0127"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0127"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, \w the|strong="H0127"\w* herds \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy \w oxen|strong="H0504"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0127"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H0127"\w* thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H0779"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* thee famine \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hunger, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H4045"\w* \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H6213"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* consume \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* thee \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* thy most wicked inventions, \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast forsaken \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* afflict thee \w with|strong="H3068"\w* miserable want, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fever|strong="H6920"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* cold, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* burning \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w heat|strong="H2746"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* corrupted air \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* blasting, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* thee \w till|strong="H5704"\w* thou \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* thou treadest \w on|strong="H5921"\w*, \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w ashes|strong="H6083"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* thou \w be|strong="H3068"\w* consumed.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w* \w down|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* mayst thou \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* scattered \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w carcass|strong="H5038"\w* meat \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Fowls \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* air, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* drive \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* thee \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* ulcer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* part \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy body, \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* dung \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w cast|strong="H5221"\w* out, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w scab|strong="H1618"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* itch: \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou canst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* thee \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w madness|strong="H7697"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w blindness|strong="H5788"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fury \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* mayst thou \w grope|strong="H4959"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* midday \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* wont \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w grope|strong="H4959"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dark, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* make straight thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* mayst thou \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H3117"\w* \w suffer|strong="H1961"\w* wrong, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* violence, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* mayst thou \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w deliver|strong="H3467"\w* thee.

Mayst thou \w take|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* sleep \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w*. Mayst thou \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.
